member.summary: Tag key. Either exists or does not exist alongside the tag value. If it does not exist, all of the user's tags will be queried.

member.summary: Tag value. Either exists or does not exist alongside the tag key. If it does not exist, all of the user's tags will be queried.

member.summary: Tag key array, which either exists or does not exist with the tag value. If it does not exist, all tags of the user will be queried. If it is passed in together with `TagKey`, it will be used and the `TagKey` will be ignored.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tag.V20180813.Models.GetResourcesRequest.ResourceList
member.summary: Six-segment resource description list. Tencent Cloud uses a six-segment value to describe a resource. For example, ResourceList.1 = qcs::${ServiceType}:${Region}:${Account}:${ResourcePreifx}/${ResourceId}. If this parameter is passed in, the list of all matching resources will be returned, and the specified `MaxResults` will become invalid. Value range of N: 0–9

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tag.V20180813.Models.GetResourcesRequest.TagFilters
member.summary: Tag key and value. If multiple tags are specified, resources bound to all such tags will be queried. Value range of N: 0–5 There can be up to 10 `TagValues` in each `TagFilters`.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tag.V20180813.Models.ModifyResourceTagsRequest.Resource
member.summary: [Six-segment resource description](https://intl.cloud.tencent.com/document/product/598/10606?from_cn_redirect=1)

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tag.V20180813.Models.ModifyResourceTagsRequest.ReplaceTags
member.summary: The tags to be added or modified. If the resource described by `Resource` is not associated with the input tag keys, an association will be added. If the tag keys are already associated, the values corresponding to the associated tag keys will be modified to the input values. This API must contain either `ReplaceTags` or `DeleteTag`, and these two parameters cannot include the same tag keys. This parameter can be omitted, but it cannot be an empty array.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tag.V20180813.Models.ModifyResourceTagsRequest.DeleteTags
member.summary: The tags to be disassociated. This API must contain either `ReplaceTags` or `DeleteTag`, and these two parameters cannot include the same tag keys. This parameter can be omitted, but it cannot be an empty array.

member.summary: For internal usage only. DO NOT USE IT.

member.name: P:TencentCloud.Tag.V20180813.Models.TagResourcesRequest.Tags
member.summary: Tag key and value. If multiple tags are specified, all such tags will be created and bound to the specified resources. For each resource, each tag key can have only one value. If you try to add an existing tag key, the corresponding tag value will be updated to the new value. Non-existent tags will be automatically created. Value range of N: 0–9
